user_query: I'm planning a surprise anniversary party for my parents. Can you assist me in sending SMS invitations to their friends and relatives? Additionally, I want to validate their phone numbers to ensure they are accurate. Also, I need to check the balance on my D7API account.

TaskList.description: Collect a list of friends and relatives' phone numbers for the invitations.
Validate the collected phone numbers to ensure they are accurate before sending invitations.
Check the balance on the D7API account to ensure enough credits for sending SMS invitations.
Send SMS invitations to the validated phone numbers of friends and relatives.
